name: The Letter: Browser
description:
The Letter: Browser is a story driven stealth/3Dplatformer game with a beautiful low poly graphic.

Story

The game is about a reporter who seeking truth about origin of war and terrorism in our world.

Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly style graphic
  • Strong female protagonist
  • Fun and exciting stealth gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • Entertaining story with strong message

Get windows version with higher graphic for free:

https://hammergamesb.itch.io/the-letter-seeker-of-truths
